overview:
Dan Ross joins GrandBanks Capital with more than 20 years executive experience in the technology industry.

Background Most recently, Dan was CEO of one of the top Chinese offshore IT services companies, DarwinSuzsoft (now named Dextrys). He was also CEO of Optiant, an optimization software supply chain company, and of Manna, a personalization software company. Dan also served as a senior executive at Open Market, the leading ecommerce software provider, and Picturetel, the market leading videoconferencing company.

Dan spent 16 years in various senior management positions at Digital Equipment corporation. He currently sits on several high tech boards, has raised funds and consulted for several companies including Correlagen, a genomics diagnostics lab.

degrees.institution: The Wharton School at The University of Pennsylvania
